divs: sighting detailsstanding outside my home. i observed three star like objects to the left of the moon in a straight line. they turned orange\red with bright angel like wings. one decending the others moved left to right. the one that descended moved back into line. the colors went dim and turned back to starlike then dissappeared.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Salem
There were no other sightings in Salem on or around December 24th 2012
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
Summary: three stars that turned into red/orange angel like bodies getting larger and moving left to right. Lights dimmed to look like a star then dissappeared.
